trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Spring Hill
There were no other sightings in Spring Hill on or around July 4th 2008
divs: Sighting Detailswe were watching fire works, but they hadnt started yet, just some small personal fire works clearly distint in the sky compared to anything else. a bright orange light appeared in the distance some miles away, but so large, it appeared to be quite large for the distance I estimated it to be , and I am trained in this, so I know the distance, and how high it may have been. Well the thing appeared out of know where as I was looking in that direction, and saw when it appeared. It was moving in a small semi circle but hovering. It was not a plane or a helo, because there were planes int the air clearly visible as our creations, and not a blimp or jet liner. I am a pilot, and have never seen anything like this. I hoverd for a while, and just vanished straigt up in the air at an incredible speed.
Summary: wittnessed arange color sphere hovering in sky, then changing direction, and vanishing
